faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions about our Prices
faqSection.subtitle: Answers to your questions about pricing and financing

faqs.question: Do the prices include all costs?
faqs.answer: Yes, our prices are all-inclusive and include all necessary services for your treatment. There are no hidden costs or additional fees.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various financing options to make it easier for you to decide on a treatment. Please feel free to ask about this in a personal consultation.

faqs.question: How is the number of required grafts determined?
faqs.answer: The number of required grafts is determined in a personal consultation based on your individual situation and your wishes. Factors such as the size of the area to be treated and the desired density play a role.

faqs.question: Can I bill the treatment with my health insurance?
faqs.answer: As a rule, aesthetic treatments are not covered by statutory health insurance. However, some private health insurance companies may partially or fully cover the costs. We are happy to advise you on the possibilities.
